data.name: Fixed Rate Car Loan
data.description: With our Fixed Rate Car Loan you can borrow as little as $10,000 for a new or used vehicle up to 10 years old.

features.additionalInfo: Choose weekly, fortnightly or monthly repayments
24/7 access via internet banking, mobile app and phone banking
Loan can be used to buy towable caravans, boats, motor cycles or classic cars
Accessories like a car navigation system, alarm and your car insurance can be added to the loan

eligibility.additionalInfo: Membership is open to citizens or permanent residents of Australia who are current or retired employees in the Australian health sector or are family members of members (i.e. shareholders) of the Bank.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: All applications for credit are subject to responsible lending criteria. Fees and charges apply. You can find our Consumer Lending terms and conditions online or from any of our offices.

fees.name: APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applicable when the loan is funded.

eligibility.additionalInfo: If you hold a Your Way Plus home loan package we waive the application fees for any personal loans.

fees.name: ARREARS_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time staff action a loan account, RediCredit or Credit Card account in arrears.

fees.name: ACCOUNT_FUNCTIONS
fees.additionalInfo: $2.50 for each increment up to 3 minutes. Payable at the time the service is provided.

fees.name: BREAK_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on early repayment i.e. during the fixed rate period if you repay the loan in full, you repay part of the loan or you switch from this loan type to another loan type. Please refer to clause 3B of the Consumer Lending terms and conditions for details of how this fee is calculated. At Cost.

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Fixed rate for 3 years. Comparison rates quoted are based on $30,000 for a term of 5 years for Car Loans. Products quoted are unsecured except Car Loans over $50,000 are secured. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees, or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

Fixed rate for 4 years. Comparison rates quoted are based on $30,000 for a term of 5 years for Car Loans. Products quoted are unsecured except Car Loans over $50,000 are secured. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees, or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

Fixed rate for 5 years. Comparison rates quoted are based on $30,000 for a term of 5 years for Car Loans. Products quoted are unsecured except Car Loans over $50,000 are secured. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees, or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

Fixed rate for 6 years. Comparison rates quoted are based on $30,000 for a term of 5 years for Car Loans. Products quoted are unsecured except Car Loans over $50,000 are secured. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees, or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.
